[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]

The Accu-Beam® Short Video Adapter connects C-mount cameras with most Microscopes and Ophthalmic Slit Lamps. It has a smaller form factor than the Universal Adapter.

  • Compact design reduces weight and footprint
  • Various lens options to work with any camera
  • Mounts are interchangeable to work with almost any camera
  • Focus-control to fine tune your image
  • X/Y adjustment to center your view
  • Adjustable iris to increase depth of field
  • Can mount to any Zeiss-style beamsplitter exit port

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72783″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574798011332{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Short C-mount Video Adapter

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

A twist on our most popular design, the Short Video Adapter is a smaller version of the Universal Video Adapter that trades interchangeable lenses for a more compact design. While the internal lens is pre-installed, it can be sent to TTI Medical to change lenses for use with a new video camera in the future.

Lens options include F35, F50, F55, F65, F85, and F107.

Part # 8102S

U.S. Patent No. 5,264,92

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d544824-a04d”][vc_column_text]

Compatible with Zeiss, Alcon, Leica/WILD, Moller-Wedel/Haag Streit, Topcon, Vasconcellos, Marco, Reichert, Shin Nippon, Takagi, Nidek, CSO, Appasamy, Burton, Woodlyn, KAPS, Seiler, Global and other manufacturers.

A Beamsplitter or Beamsplitter Adapter may be required.

Haag-Streit Disclaimer

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d4824-a04d”][vc_column_text]

The Short Video Adapter is a class 1 device, and is approved to bear the CE mark. TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a4824-a04d”][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
